name: Forseti
description:
Forseti (Old Norse: Fosite) also known as Forseti Baldurson (Translation: Forseti, Son of Baldur) is the Norse God of Justice and Reconciliation. He is a member of the Aesir Royal Family.
Although he doesn't make any appearance in game, he is mentioned for the first time in God of War: Ragnarök, living among his fellow Aesir gods in the Great Lodge. He presumably survived Ragnarök and later settled in Vanaheim with the other survivors.
